bug.author: neerajprad
bug.summary: Notebook not running with Pyro docker image
bug.description: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jpchen>@jpchen</denchmark-link> mentioned that there is an issue with recent Docker image where the notebook session cannot be accessed from the browser.

comments.comment:
thanks for looking into this! <denchmark-code>> make notebook img=pyro-cpu-dev-3.6 Copy/paste this URL into your browser when you connect for the first time, to login with a token: http://0.0.0.0:8888/?token=becb10939593b64b4988cb051f617bc0b1a20f539237e173 </denchmark-code>
that URL does not work even though the build succeeds
